drupalNodeEvent.title: Zhao Ziyang and the Voices for Reform

field_description.processed: The presentation focuses on Zhao Ziyang’s rise through the echelons of the party state and his surprising metamorphosis from a trusted loyal party official into a unflinching reformer bent on changing the political arch of the PRC. The story of Zhao Ziyang will take us on a journey through the ups and downs of the world of the party in the 1980’s, revealing the deeply conflicting views within the party about the reform of the socialist system.
